definition: to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]

sentences.english: This cook just happened to be rather ignorant, so he did not mind being cruel when he had the upper hand.
sentences.chinese: 這個廚師恰好無知愚魯，在佔上風時，手下毫不留情。

sentences.english: Anger begins in folly, and ends in repentance .
sentences.chinese: 憤怒始於愚魯，而終於悔恨。

sentences.english: The president's insensitive comments caused a lot of eyebrows to be raised.
sentences.chinese: 總統愚魯的言論造成一大堆疑雲升起。

sentences.english: Anger begins in folly, and ends in repentance.
sentences.chinese: 憤怒起於愚魯，而終於悔恨。
